amendment.description: Amendment makes clear that the Paris Agreement seeks to address issues of environmental justice and the disparate impact climate change is having and will continue to have on vulnerable communities and people of color.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 116-42 to include findings addressing the importance of climate justice and environmental justice.
